column3:
(Dibrugarh East - A. In order to discharge the logged water a total of 06 Nos. Of Dewatering pump has been operating under Dibrugarh East
Revenue Circle-
1. Thakurbari pump, Maijan 2. Natun Gaon pump, Maijan 3. Near Garbage dumping ground pump, Maijan 4. Near Dibrugarh Municipality
Corporation Pump, Phoolbagan 5. Tinkunia pump, Graham Bazar 6. Phoolbagan pump, Phoolbagan.
B. Various cleaning and excavation activities of blocked drains are being carried out in different areas by the concern Line Departments and
ULB, Dbr to minimise the water logging problem which arises due to flash flood.)
